start.paragraph: This completes your secure access to this service.

no-cases-found.paragraph: There are no cases associated with this email. Please check you used the correct email, and access this service again via the IMA start page.

save-and-exit.header: You have information has been saved
save-and-exit.paragraph1: To continue your form, use the link we have emailed to:

helper-details.paragraph: Answer all the following questions as if you are the person on the Illegal Migration Act notice.

immigration-adviser-details.paragraph: We will use these detail if we need to contact you.

medical-records.response-label1: You can change your mind at any time by emailing [EMAIL ADDRESS] to tell the Home Office they no longer have permission to access your medical records.

confirm.submit-warning: You will not be able to change your answers after you submit.

immigration-adviser-declaration.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

helper-declaration.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

form-submitted.paragraph1: We have sent a copy of completed form to:
form-submitted.paragraph2: We will make decision about your claim, then contact you to tell you what you need to do next.
